name: Coin Collector Platformer
description:
Title: Collection Game

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Target Marketing: 6+

Game Overview: Unity sampler game created in class with Unity and other assets, not made for commercial use or as a real game. Mostly to test scripts

Instructions: Use the WASD keys to move, SHIFT to sprint, and SPACE to jump. Collect all the coins before the level is restarted!

Game Design Team:

Samantha Parton - Game Designer
